description: Variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 29th May 2024 (RN: 24/00532/FULL) for the excavation of a basement, alterations to the front elevation, replacement of existing mansard roof and the introduction of rooflights and rooftop plant, with associated works. NAMELY, amendments to entrance door and adjacent window location, rooflights and plant equipment.
